topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a96c2636872256e2f0100#post_548a96c2636872256e2f0100
Fun Squiggy Fact.
When I was younger my diet was pretty much vegetarian. I'd eat everything that other kids hated. Broccoli, brussel sprouts, cauliflower, gabbage, carrots, spinach, turnip greens, and all manner of vegetable goodness. Even now I tend to have a weakness for vegetables.
